headline: Afghan 'Animal' 💥🔫 AMBUSHES Guard Bros 😩🏥 Near Trump Tower 🏰‼️
text:
TWO THICC 💪 National Guard DUDES from West Virginia 🟢🐸 got DROPPED 😵💥 in CRITICAL CONDITION 🏥🚨 after a LOUDMOUTH Afghan INVADER Rahmanullah Lakamal 🕌🔥 – who SLID INTO USA 🇺🇸🍑 via Biden's CHAOTIC WITHDRAWAL FIASCO 💨🛬 back in Sept 2021 – PULLED A 'TERROR ACT' 🎭💣 less than TWO BLOCKS from WHITE HOUSE 🏛️😤! Nearby Guard CHADS 🦸‍♂️💪 heard the BANG BANG 🔥🔫 and POUNCED 🐱‍👤 – SHOT the AFGHANI ANIMAL 🐺🍆 FOUR TIMES 🖐️💥, PINNED HIM DOWN 😤🔒 till COPS ROLLED UP 🚔⚡! FBI Boss KASH PATEL 🕵️‍♂️🔥 calls it 'HORRENDOUS VIOLENCE' 😠💀, Metro Chief Jeff Carroll SPILLS ☕: 'AMBUSHED like pros 🎯😩!' WV Gov Patrick Morrisey 🟢📣 flipped from 'DEAD 😢' to 'CONFLICTING REPORTS 🤷‍♂️' on the HEROES' status 🏥❓. Trump's 'OUT OF CONTROL' CRIME CRUSADE 🛡️📉 SLAYING STATS: Homicides DROPPED from 107 to 62 🔻💀, offenses TANKED 6500 vs 9500 📊🚀 – DEM MAYOR CALLS IT 'TARGETED' but ORANGE MAN GOOD 🍊😎 credits GUARD GLOW-UP!
